name: Blue Moon (Dexion)
overview: Dexion's first shareware release, done on July 25 1991. Game coding and GFX by Tox. Intro GFX by Natrix and Tox. Blue Boon is a 2 player game dogfight game. Both players are controlled by joystick for this fight to the death. Gadgets of both Power and Bean type can be found to repair or upgrade ships, depending on what you need.
